name: DatasetOneSample
description:
Retrieves one sample from the dataset (at a given or random index) and instantiates it in the parametric model. 
Requires a dataset to be loaded.

inputParameters.name: item
inputParameters.description: Index of the sample in the dataset, optional. If not provided, a random index will be selected.

inputParameters.name: get
inputParameters.description: Set to True to retrieve a sample.
